item.description:
Let's spend the afternoon at Rosedale Farm and Vineyards. I have never been, but I've checked out their website. Feel free to share if you have been. I'm going to say we'll meet at noon at the main entrance, but I have not been. So I have posted my cell phone number as well.

Winetasting is $9 and gets you a souvenir glass. I'm thinking it'd be fun to take a bottle of wine on the hayride if they'll allow you to do that. They also have donuts for sale, coffee, apples, all nice fall things. So let's hope it's a nice fall day :) Check out their website if you want to know more. http://www.rosedale1920.com/

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: Fall Afternoon at Rosedale Farm and Vineyards - Winetasting, Corn Maze, Hayride
